rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card, then discards a card.
[i]Threshold[/i] – Whenever an opponent draws a card, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, that player lose 1 life.
flavor_text: [i]She braved the Abyss but did not live to tell of her ordeal. As such, little is known.[/i]
